name: ServiceBridge IRC Services
short_description: Service Bridge IRC services are intended to be a full solution to all IRC Universal (SF Project: IRCU) servers.  The idea is simple use plugin-modules to reuse code and save on CPU time, supporting multple services in 1 connection.
